name: ANGEL SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT AND RESEARCH ASSOCIATION
briefDescription: Angels Social Development and Research Association (SDRA) is a non-profit, non-government development organization committed to improving the lives of people less fortunate in Madhya Pradesh, India, through participation and empowerment. It was established in the Bhopal region of Madhya Pradesh and is registered in 2015 under the Madhya Pradesh Societies Registration Act 1973 and working since 3 years. From its humble beginnings, Angels SDRA has grown into a vibrant organisation working with a range of people across multiple sectors. Angels SDRA implements programmes in vaious sectors, catering to the needs of vulnerable communities.
